title: BRIEF-Middle Island Resources Says Tajiri Resources Exercised Option To Buy Co's Reo Gold Project
text:
BRIEF-Middle Island Resources Says Tajiri Resources Exercised Option To Buy Co's Reo Gold Project

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 02, 2019 18:41)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Middle Island Resources Says Tajiri Resources Exercised Option To Buy Co's Reo Gold Project Sept 3 (Reuters) - Middle Island Resources Ltd : * MIDDLE ISLAND RESOURCES SAYS TAJIRI RESOURCES EXERCISED ITS OPTION TO FULLY ACQUIRE MDI'S REO GOLD PROJECT IN BURKINA FASO, WEST AFRICA * TRANSACTION COMPRISES OF US$335,000 CASH PAYMENT TO MIDDLE ISLAND AND 5 MLN FULLY PAID TAJ ORDINARY SHARES Source: Further company coverage: MDI.AX

BRIEF-Middle Island Resources Says Tajiri Resources Exercised Option To Buy Co's Reo Gold Project
